items.headline: ‘Fifty Shades of Grey’ author E.L. James lists her L.A. mansion for $7.25 million
items.summary_en: Author E.L. James has put her sprawling Los Angeles home on the market for $7.25 million—having slashed a staggering $1 million from her original asking price.

items.headline: ‘I’m considering driving Lyft part time’: I’m 58 with a $1 million home. Do I finally give up work and enjoy life?
